title: Bug 121687 - Exception throws when exporting data in a table within a grid cell.
description: The bug occurs when attempting to export data from a table nested within a grid cell, leading to an exception in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() function.
OB: An exception is thrown during the attempt to export data from a table within a grid cell.
EB: Exporting data from two tables should result in a successful export. Expected result: Data are exported. Actual result: An exception occurs in ReportEngineService.getMetaData().
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to a grid containing multiple cells.
2. Within a grid cell, locate a table with data that needs to be exported.
3. Initiate the data export process for the table within the grid cell.
